mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_m_sub (id, pub_ext_id, subscriber_id, group, name, tree, operator_id, begin_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{pubExtId}, #{subscriberId}, #{group}, #{name}, #{tree}, #{operatorId}, #{beginTime})
mapper.select: SELECT msub.id, msub.pub_ext_id, msub.subscriber_id, msub.group, msub.name, msub.tree, msub.operator_id, mpub.ext_id FROM mm_m_sub msub, mm_m_pub mpub WHERE msub.pub_ext_id = mpub.pub_ext_id AND msub.subscriber_id = #{subscriberId} AND msub.group = #{group} AND msub.name = #{name} AND msub.tree = #{tree}
